h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Cyan Loong
content: Once you've had your fill of exploring the "Turtle Island", you can head to the front where the small Pig Guai stands waiting, and interact with him for the turtle to finally make its landing at the next part of the Bitter Lake.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Cyan Loong'.
The content is as follows:
Once you've had your fill of exploring the "Turtle Island", you can head to the front where the small Pig Guai stands waiting, and interact with him for the turtle to finally make its landing at the next part of the Bitter Lake.
